description: Analyze images and videos with Gemini to get fast, reliable visual insights. Handle content from URLs and YouTube links. Summarize scenes, identify objects, and extract key details for reports or automation. This is remote version, check local branch in github to use local tools.

modelName.description: Optional Gemini model name override. Defaults to models/gemini-flash-lite-latest.

geminiApiKey.description: Your Google Gemini API key for image and video analysis. Falls back to GEMINI_API_KEY when omitted.

capabilities.name: analyze_image
capabilities.description: Analyzes images available via URLs using Gemini API. Maximum file size: 16 MB.

capabilities.name: analyze_youtube_video
capabilities.description: Analyzes a YouTube video from URL using Gemini API. No size limit.
